column1: Smoque BBQ////We've never had to wait for a table
column2: and my boyfriend basically lives to eat here whenever possible. It honestly took a little while to grow on me. The brisket and pulled pork are quite good
column3: but they just offer the one signature sauce. I continue to be unimpressed by their sides - tiny little cups for a little too much money
column4: the mac and cheese especially just isn't anything special. That said
column5: it's a good place to grab a bite
column7: and odds are any bbq fanatics you bring will like it.
